text: Nuko ubwo imanza zizaba zimaze gucibwa Shitani avuge ati "Mu by’ukuri, Allah yabasezeranyije isezerano ry’ukuri (ryo kuzazurwa kugororerwa). Naho njye isezerano no nabahaye sinaryubahirije, kuko nta bubasha nari mbafiteho uretse ko nabahamagaye mukanyitaba. Ku bw’ibyo, ntimumvebe ahubwo mwivebe ubwanyu. (Ubu) ntacyo nabamarira kandi na mwe ntacyo mwamarira. Mu by’ukuri, njye mpakanye ibikorwa byanyu mwakoze (ubwo mwarekaga gusenga Allah) mukambangikanya na we. Mu by’ukuri, inkozi z’ibibi zizahanishwa ibihano bibabaza
